column4: gah. the new ubuntu live cd is 15mb more than my cd can hold....dvds arnt working for meh
yah...that means i would have to buy it haha. i wish my usb drive would boot. i tried extracting the iso to my usb drive but it wouldnt boot
sweet, have you ever succeded in making a bootable usb drive for ubuntu?
i havent but u need a motherboard that supports usb booting (just sayin in case u dint no)
